segments.text: Why , Tom ? It's five to six already and you are still writing here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what ? Are we going anywhere ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , have you forgotten ? We have arranged to go to Mary's to watch some videos tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm sorry I forgot all about it.Well , can I take a rain check ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's the matter with you ? You are the one that persuaded all of us to go there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm terribly sorry , Rose.But I have to finish this paper by tomorrow or professor Martin will kill me .
segments.speaker: S2
